EmailTemplate.description: only going to those who didn't receive the original reminder this morning at 10am
EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Pivotal_Roadshow_Q216.LA 1-day reminder parking update
EmailTemplate.subject: See you tomorrow at the Pivotal Cloud Native Roadshow!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Cloud Native Roadshow taking place tomorrow in Los Angeles. We look forward to seeing you there!
Pivotal Cloud Native Roadshow—Los Angeles, CA Friday, May 6th, 2016 8:30am – 9:30am Breakfast 9:30am – 3:30pm Sessions
<[[http://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow/losangeles?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=pivotal-roadshow-2016-LA]]> Roadshow Agenda
Location: UCLA - Carnesale Commons Conference Center 251 Charles E Young Drive West Los Angeles, CA 90095 Room: Hermosa (2nd Floor)
<[[https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B4P-2Z2JeoW7MF9BTV9VejBGT2c/view?usp=sharing]]>
Map & Directions
Arrive early (prior to 9:30am) for FREE Parking all day!
When parking, please state that you are with the Pivotal Meeting to the attendant. You will receive a parking pass that will need to be posted on your vehicle’s window.
Questions? Contact Paul Santos at psantos@pivotal.io We look forward to seeing you!
The Pivotal Team
